description: Common Ground provides members with an optimal and diverse co-working environment, alongside many other member perks.
ComparaOnline empowers consumers in Latin America to compare insurance products and rates online.
Comunal offers fully equipped workspaces and complementary premium services such as meeting rooms, Internet, cafeteria, and cleaning.

Comunique-se develops communication software designed to offer online corporate communication services. Their software offers influence marketing, investor relations and corporate television communication technology, enabling businesses to improve reputation and positioning.
Conekta is an online payments platform in Mexico that uses artificial intelligence to enable its customers to analyze transaction behavior and identify fraudulent purchases.
Conexia is a technology services provider transforming healthcare delivery.
Confiance Medical produces, sells and rents equipment for laparoscopy and offers after-sale services.
Congelados del Sur produces high quality and convenient frozen food such as pizzas, veggie milanesas, appetizers and snacks for retailers and CPG companies in Latin America.
Connect Assistance provides roadside assistance and home services through various channels, including auto distributors, insurance companies, and direct to consumer subscriptions.
Constella Intelligence provides digital risk protection services to quickly and efficiently disrupt cyber attacks and data breaches before they occur.
ContaAzul is a cloud-based accounting solution where small business owners and accountants can work together on the same platform, helping to increase efficiency and organization.
Contabilizei is a government-certified, fully-automated online accounting and tax reporting service for SMBs in Brazil.
Contifico is an accounting and financial management platform for MSMEs in Ecuador.
Contigo grants women in rural areas productive group loans that allow them to use their talent and improve their lives and that of their families.
Copia is an e-commerce platform that is turning the historically neglected population of low and middle-income African consumers into empowered participants in the global economy.
Cora is a Brazilian 100% digital bank that provides small and medium businesses with “the digital account your company deserves”.
Corbac manufactures dehydrated beef, seafood and legumes for institutional and industrial clients including Nestle and Knorr using proprietary R&D.
CORE SDI (CORE) specializes in computer systems security, providing both consulting and software.
Cortex Intelligence empowers decision making for sales and marketing teams to drive growth.
Cosa is a smart home assistant that allows users to control the temperature of their home using mobile phones and reduce their energy bills.
